entry.title: Zeiss ZM 50mm f1.5 C-Sonnar: Portrait of a lens
entry.summary: The 50mm Sonnar f1.5 is a transplant from the Contax rangefinder world. A was real classic there. Also, it is indeed a personality with a focus shift.

content.div:
The 50mm Sonnar f1.5 is a transplant from the Zeiss Contax rangefinder world. A was real classic there. Also, it is indeed a personality with a focus shift. More on that below.
